about us

We are a team combining skills and passion in the implementation of online products individually tailored to the client's needs. Our products are fully flexible because we do not offer " off the shelf " solutions. We create the products based on the specific requirements of the end-user.

We place great emphasis on the visual side of online products because we are aware that the image is worth a thousand words

The product packaging creates the first impression, which has been confirmed by statistics examining the decisions made by website visitors. Research indicates that visitors decide within the first 15 seconds whether they will remain on the website and whether the website is attractive for shopping.

HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS

IN OUR PROJECTS WE PUT EMPHASIS ON:

  • the highest quality of workmanship
  • receptiveness at every stage of implementation
  • efficient design solutions
  • possibility of expansion in the future
  • possibility of participation in the development of the shape of each element during the design
  • technical support after the product development

Websites

to meet your needs

High Accessibility

We provide the ability to display our websites on all mobile devices making them visible to a wide range of users

We enable our clients to reach a large audience regardless of the device and type of web browser used.

Tailor-made websites

In our projects, we try to meet the expectations and visions of our customers. We do not use website templates and ready-made solutions.

We create websites adapted to the specifics and requirements of our clients. Our client decides about the shape and scope of the product.

Website redesign

We redesign and update websites providing them with a modern look and better visual identification by the user by improving quality.

If you have a website that doesn't meet your expectations, we can redesign it to meet all of your requirements.

SUPPORT FOR OUR CLIENTS

After the launching period, we provide our clients with technical support in the maintenance of developed websites.

All of our websites are implemented in a way that allows their easy expansion in the future without incurring high costs of modification. Thanks to us, you don't have to deal with technical aspects related to website administration.

If you have any questions, we are always available.

AS PART OF TECHNICAL SUPPORT, WE OFFER:

  • archiving site data
  • site content updates
  • minor modifications to the site structure
  • technical support after the implementation period
  • adapting the website to search engines

STANDARD PROJECTS BASED ON WORDPRESS

Standard projects are the "budget" version of web projects based on WordPress content management System. Based on WordPress, we create websites and e-commerce online stores for any number of products and any retailer.

We provide support for 8 weeks after delivery.
If I would like to use any Premium Plugin/Theme, you may need to purchase it to access lifetime support from its developers. None of our packages include a license for premium plugins or themes.
